attributes.action: call for a government of national unity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We call on the Prime Minister and Government to resign in the national interest and so make way for a truly representative national government formed from all the talents and charged with the task of bringing about bold and imaginative policies to address the economic crisis that threatens to destroy this nations stability. 

This is a task that stands above political dogma and transcends the boundaries of narrow political interest as did the last national government in the dire days of the Second World War
